gate.uima.mapping
Class GateAnnotationBuilder

java.lang.Object
  gate.uima.mapping.GateAnnotationBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObjectBuilder
public class GateAnnotationBuilder
extends Object
implements ObjectBuilder

An ObjectBuilder that creates a GATE annotation in the given annotation set.

Field Summary
protected  String annotationType
          The type of GATE annotation to create.
protected  List featureDefs
          Feature definitions for the annotation.

          UIMA feature object for the end feature of an annotation.
protected  org.apache.uima.cas.Type uimaType
          The UIMA annotation type that this annotation is to be based on.

applyFeatureDefs

protected void applyFeatureDefs(FeatureMap features,
                                org.apache.uima.cas.CAS cas,
                                Document doc,
                                AnnotationSet annSet,
                                Annotation currentGateAnn,
                                org.apache.uima.cas.FeatureStructure currentUimaAnn)
                         throws MappingException
Use the set of feature definitions on this builder to update the given feature map. If the value builder for a given feature returns the value null the corresponding feature will be removed from the map if it is present.

Throws:
MappingException
